job_tasks.phrase: Als Front-End Engineer werk je mee aan het de ontwikkelen van onze SAAS producten Apollo en Juno
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core responsibility of developing software products, which falls under traditional software engineering.

job_tasks.phrase: Je vindt het tof om mooie, bruikbare en betekenisvolle software te ontwikkelen.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes the creation of functional and meaningful software, a key aspect of software development.

job_tasks.phrase: je gaat leveren aan de look & feel en gebruikersinteractie van onze softwareproducten
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the user interface and interaction, which are integral parts of front-end software development.

job_tasks.phrase: het echte werk zit in de javascript libraries.
job_tasks.justification: Highlights the use of JavaScript libraries, a fundamental component of front-end development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt kennis en de eerste stapjes gezet met front-end frameworks zoals Vue of React
job_tasks.justification: Mentions experience with front-end frameworks, directly relating to software development.

job_tasks.phrase: Je hebt wellicht zelf al eens een REST API aangeroepen met een asynchrone functie.
job_tasks.justification: Describes interacting with APIs, a common software integration task.

job_tasks.phrase: onder begeleiding van onze Senior Front-End Engineer en development team je de kennis eigen maakt.
job_tasks.justification: Indicates working within a development team to acquire and apply knowledge, a standard software engineering practice.

job_tasks.phrase: Je onderzoekt ook nieuwe technologieën en werkt actief mee aan de ontwikkeling en het onderhoud van onze producten.
job_tasks.justification: Covers active participation in product development and maintenance, core software engineering tasks.

job_tasks.phrase: Als Medior Front-End Engineer ontwerp je ook mee als dat in je capaciteiten valt: het is niet alleen uitvoerende taak maar het biedt ook de mogelijkheid om mee te denken en te ontwerpen om de mooiste en best werkende software te maken.
job_tasks.justification: Describes design and development of software, extending beyond just execution to include conceptualization.

job_tasks.phrase: Enige kennis van back-end software engineering is meegenomen om de afstemming met de rest van het team soepel te laten verlopen.
job_tasks.justification: Mentions knowledge of back-end software engineering for team coordination, indicating an integrated development approach.

job_tasks.phrase: Onze SAAS producten Apollo of Juno doorontwikkelen voor veel verschillende klanten (Overheid / B2B)
job_tasks.justification: Focuses on the continuous development of SaaS products, a core software engineering activity.
Relates to the design and optimization of user interfaces and experiences, part of the software development lifecycle.

job_tasks.phrase: Een front-end-visie mede ontwikkelen voor ons Stratum Analytics Platform met ons development team om onze datagedreven product-ambities te realiseren en betekenisvolle software te maken.
job_tasks.justification: Involves developing a front-end vision for a platform and creating meaningful software, aligning with software engineering goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Nauwwe samenwerking met de rest van het development team om development en operations goed aan te laten sluiten.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase mentions aligning development and operations, which is a key aspect of DevOps and MLOps principles, even if not explicitly AI-related.

soft_skills.phrase: Je bent leergierig
soft_skills.justification: Directly states the requirement for being eager to learn.

soft_skills.phrase: met een team te werken
soft_skills.justification: Indicates the need to work collaboratively within a team.

soft_skills.phrase: het leuk vindt om met een team te werken aan maatschappelijke opgaven waarbij jij een bijdrage gaat leveren aan de look & feel en gebruikersinteractie van onze softwareproducten
soft_skills.justification: Combines working on societal tasks with a team and contributing to software, implying a learning and collaborative environment.

soft_skills.phrase: Als Junior heb je verhoogde interesse in software technologie, met in het bijzonder front-end technologieën.
soft_skills.justification: Expresses a strong interest in software technology, indicating a desire to learn and grow in the field.

soft_skills.phrase: Je hebt kennis en de eerste stapjes gezet met front-end frameworks
soft_skills.justification: Suggests foundational knowledge and the initiation of learning in specific frameworks.

soft_skills.phrase: en bent bekend met frameworks zoals Bootstrap en Tailwind.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates familiarity with specific tools, implying a level of learning and application.

soft_skills.phrase: Je schrikt niet van utility-first
soft_skills.justification: Suggests an openness to new or specific methodologies, indicating adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: en bent bekend met frameworks zoals Bootstrap en Tailwind.
soft_skills.justification: Indicates familiarity with specific tools, implying a level of learning and application.

soft_skills.phrase: maken je wegwijs in onze manier van werken.
soft_skills.justification: Implies that the company will guide the candidate, and the candidate is expected to learn their methods.

soft_skills.phrase: We verwachten niet dat je op dag 1 al direct onze applicaties kan ontwikkelen, maar wel dat je leergierig bent
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly states that eagerness to learn is expected, even without immediate full capability.

soft_skills.phrase: je de kennis eigen maakt.
soft_skills.justification: Focuses on the process of acquiring knowledge.

soft_skills.phrase: Je onderzoekt ook nieuwe technologieën
soft_skills.justification: Directly states the task of researching new technologies.

soft_skills.phrase: We helpen je groeien in de Front-End vanuit een praktische context.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the company's role in fostering growth and learning.

soft_skills.phrase: Als Medior heb je natuurlijk al de nodige stappen gezet in de Front-End
soft_skills.justification: Implies prior learning and experience in front-end development.

soft_skills.phrase: Als Medior Front-End Engineer ontwerp je ook mee als dat in je capaciteiten valt: het is niet alleen uitvoerende taak maar het biedt ook de mogelijkheid om mee te denken en te ontwerpen om de mooiste en best werkende software te maken.
soft_skills.justification: Encourages thinking along and designing, which involves communication and collaboration on technical solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Enige kennis van back-end software engineering is meegenomen om de afstemming met de rest van het team soepel te laten verlopen.
soft_skills.justification: Highlights the importance of smooth coordination with the team, a communication and collaboration aspect.

soft_skills.phrase: bent goed op de hoogte van ontwikkelingen in de Front-End Engineering wereld en kunt meedenken met het vertalen naar onze problematiek.
soft_skills.justification: Requires staying updated with industry developments and applying that knowledge to specific problems, indicating continuous learning and adaptability.

soft_skills.phrase: Als Medior kun je altijd leunen op ons Senior Front-End Engineer en Development team
soft_skills.justification: Indicates reliance on and collaboration with senior team members.

soft_skills.phrase: maar ontwikkel je ook eigen opvattingen over hoe het beter, slimmer, handiger, veiliger schaalbaarder kan.
soft_skills.justification: Encourages developing personal views on improvement, which implies learning and critical thinking.

soft_skills.phrase: om onze datagedreven product-ambities te realiseren en betekenisvolle software te maken.
soft_skills.justification: Aligns the technical work with business ambitions (data-driven product goals), indicating business understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: met ons development team
soft_skills.justification: Explicitly mentions working with a development team.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses exclusively on front-end software engineering tasks, including developing, integrating, and maintaining SAAS products, working with JavaScript libraries and frameworks (Vue, React, Bootstrap, Tailwind), and interacting with APIs. There is no mention of AI/ML models, generative AI, or related specialized tasks. The role emphasizes core software development practices and collaboration within a development team. Therefore, it fits the 'Software Engineer' profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job advertisement is very clear and specific about the responsibilities and technologies involved, which are entirely within the domain of front-end software engineering. There is no ambiguity or mention of AI/ML, making the classification straightforward.
